holidays.title: British Summertime Ends
holidays.description: Like many other countries, the U.K. changes its clocks twice a year to extend daylight.

holidays.title: Create a Great Funeral Day
holidays.description: On Create a Great Funeral Day, plan memorable memorial services for all your family members.

holidays.title: Haunted Refrigerator Night
holidays.description: There is nothing more terrifying than old moldy food in the fridge.

holidays.title: Mischief Night
holidays.description: Play some pranks to put a smile on the faces of people around you.

holidays.title: National Candy Corn Day
holidays.description: We eat them like popcorn, so grab a handful and join us for celebrating candy corn!

holidays.title: National Publicist Day
holidays.description: Show some love to all the publicists out there on National Publicist Day.

holidays.title: National Speak Up For Service Day
holidays.description: An event specially organized to recognize the contribution of the youth towards community service.

holidays.title: National Text Your Ex Day
holidays.description: Get out your phone, think of something you want to say, and hit send!

holidays.title: National Treat Your Pet Day
holidays.description: Let your pets have extra fun with their favorite kibbles this National Treat Your Pet Day!

holidays.title: Andrew Schulz’s Birthday
holidays.description: When it comes to his craft, this brave comic does not take “no” for an answer.

holidays.title: Ashley Graham’s Birthday
holidays.description: Her takeover as a successful supermodel has made history, and in a very positive way.

holidays.title: Becca Tilley’s Birthday
holidays.description: Heartbreak isn’t stopping this star of reality T.V., social media, and business.

holidays.title: Claude Lelouch’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this filmmaker, setting goals is the first step in turning the invisible into the visible.

holidays.title: Devin Booker’s Birthday
holidays.description: Booker is a brilliant N.B.A. player and a promising young star.

holidays.title: Diego Maradona’s Birthday
holidays.description: An unforgettable soccer player, one of the greatest of all time — he deserves to be celebrated.

holidays.title: Gavin Rossdale’s Birthday
holidays.description: This rock star is not slowing down. We can’t wait to see what he does next.

holidays.title: Grace Slick’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this talented musician and painter, anyone who fights for the future lives in it today.

holidays.title: Harry Hamlin’s Birthday
holidays.description: He’s been on our screens for decades and we still enjoy watching his performances.

holidays.title: Henry Winkler’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this talented actor, director, and producer, self-belief and hard work will always earn you success.

holidays.title: Ivanka Trump’s Birthday
holidays.description: She’s been making headlines in the political arena and there's plenty more to come.

holidays.title: John Adams’s Birthday
holidays.description: He was a noble and dedicated politician who fought tirelessly for his nation.

holidays.title: Marcus Mariota’s Birthday
holidays.description: Oregon’s football legend’s career over the years has been nothing short of amazing!

holidays.title: Mike Stud’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this talented American rapper and entrepreneur, great things come from hard work and perseverance.

holidays.title: Nia Long’s Birthday
holidays.description: We're tapping into the life of one of Hollywood’s well-known faces, Nia Long!

holidays.title: Shante Broadus’s Birthday
holidays.description: Like this American businesswoman and celebrity, never lose hope. Storms make people stronger.
